entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 07:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early this afternoon then changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
